abstract: Living a life of no regrets.
description: Bill Bush joined the army for a bit of adventure and to escape troubles at home. He fought in Korea, where his skills as a paramedic were also utilised. He continued this work into civilian life. With a mantra of doing what you were told, without complaint, Bill ultimately leads a happy life doing what he loves.
